mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENU VALUES (#{menu_code}, NEXT VALUE FOR menu_cnt, #{menu_name}, #{menu_price}, #{menu_ex}, #{menu_star})
mapper.update: UPDATE MENU SET menu_name = #{menu_name}, menu_price = #{menu_price}, menu_ex = #{menu_ex}, menu_star = #{menu_star} WHERE menu_code = #{menu_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PICTURE VALUES ((SELECT max(no) FROM MENU), #{filename})
mapper.select: SELECT filename FROM PICTURE WHERE no = #{no}
